name: Office for Civil Rights (OCR)
authority: HHS enforces HIPAA Privacy Security and Breach Notification Rules
enforcement_powers: Issue warnings, assess civil penalties up to $1.5M annually, negotiate settlements, demand corrective actions, coordinate criminal referrals
investigation_process: Receive complaints, conduct preliminary review, notify entity, gather information, investigate, issue determination

name: Centers for Medicare & Medicaid Services (CMS)
authority: Federal agency administering Medicare and Medicaid
enforcement_powers: Deny or revoke Medicare/Medicaid funds, recommend exclusion from federal programs, enforce conditions of participation
column7: review entity compliance with participation requirements

name: Department of Justice (DOJ)
authority: Federal law enforcement enforces criminal HIPAA violations
enforcement_powers: Prosecute criminal cases, seek fines and imprisonment, seize assets, pursue conspiracy charges, seek injunctive relief
investigation_process: Receive criminal referral from OCR, conduct grand jury investigation, file charges, pursue prosecution

name: State Attorneys General
enforcement_powers: Enforce state HIPAA counterparts, coordinate civil investigations, issue subpoenas, seek state penalties and injunctions
investigation_process: Receive complaints, investigate, coordinate with OCR, issue civil investigative demands, negotiate settlements

name: Federal Trade Commission (FTC)
authority: Consumer protection authority for non-HIPAA entities
enforcement_powers: Enforce Health Breach Notification Rule for non-HIPAA entities, assess civil penalties, coordinate with state AGs
investigation_process: Receive breach notifications, investigate violations, conduct enforcement, seek consumer redress

name: State Health Departments
enforcement_powers: Enforce state health laws, coordinate with OCR, license/discipline providers, investigate facility complaints
investigation_process: Conduct facility inspections, receive complaints, investigate, coordinate with OCR, recommend enforcement

name: State Insurance Commissioners
authority: Regulate health insurance plans and carriers
enforcement_powers: Enforce state insurance laws, oversee health plan compliance, license health plans, assess penalties
investigation_process: Conduct audits, receive complaints, investigate health plans, coordinate with OCR, enforce state law

name: Inspector General (OIG) Office
authority: HHS oversight of fraud waste and abuse
enforcement_powers: Exclude from federal programs, seek civil monetary penalties, recommend criminal prosecution, conduct audits
investigation_process: Conduct fraud investigations, audit entity billing and practices, refer to DOJ, maintain exclusion list

name: Substance Abuse and Mental Health Services Administration (SAMHSA)
authority: Regulates and enforces 42 CFR Part 2 substance use disorder records
enforcement_powers: Enforce 42 CFR Part 2 stricter standards than HIPAA, assess civil penalties, recommend criminal prosecution
investigation_process: Receive complaints, investigate Part 2 violations, coordinate with OCR, enforce stricter rules

name: State Data Protection Authorities
authority: State-level privacy and data protection oversight
enforcement_powers: Enforce state privacy laws, issue fines, require notifications, coordinate with federal regulators, issue guidance
investigation_process: Receive breach notifications, investigate violations, issue orders, coordinate with OCR, impose penalties
cfr_citation: State privacy and breach notification laws
